item.title: 2 core systems ( cpu /ram/mobo) i5-3570k + AMD A8-3870 apu
item.author: invalid@example.com (ferretcloud)
item.dc:creator: ferretcloud
item.content:encoded:
Selling my old workstation + htpc/steambox

Got Ryzen last octoberish, workstation is now a glorified NAS / VM host.
htpc / steambox just isnt used anymore


workstation:
CPU was OC'd to 4.3 stable ~ 45c under load, never voltage increased.
====
i5-3570k w/ havik-140 cooler
Includes original cpu cooler if needed

MOBO
Manufacturer: Gigabyte Technology Co., Ltd.
Product Name: Z77X-D3H

32G ddr3 , 4x8G
2x Part Number: F3-1866C10-8GAB
2x Part Number: F3-1600C9-8GXM...

2 core systems ( cpu /ram/mobo) i5-3570k + AMD A8-3870 apu

item.dc:creator: altechi
item.content:encoded:
Up For Sale is my Gigabyte Aorus Rx580

This card was used for one of my relative's build, who has since upgraded.

It was bought from PCCG a couple of months ago and is in great condition. Receipt can be provided upon request.




Reserve:$295pp
Instant:$400pp

Leading: Kavii w/ res+pp

Closing: Wednesday 6pm AEST

Postage Only

item.title: 7870K+MOBO+RAM+HDD
item.author: invalid@example.com (Nukeyb0i)
item.dc:creator: Nukeyb0i
item.content:encoded:
upgraded so this stuff is up for sale the cpu+mobo+ddr3 ram were bought from pc case gear May 2016 all in excellent condition. i havnt taken the system apart yet but ill offer 7 days DOA will cap shipping at $5 for ram and ssd $8 for hdd and $15 for mobo+cpu combo.

1. Combo AMD 7870K 4C8T CPU + ASUS A68HM-PLUS Motherboard
Res $100
http://goo.gl/Y8Gjt6

2. Kingston HyperX Fury 2x4GB 1866mhz HX318C10FBK2/8
Res $60

3. Seagate 2TB 3.5" HDD (stats in pic)
Res $50...

7870K+MOBO+RAM+HDD

item.title: Fractal Design Define S Case
item.author: invalid@example.com (im late)
item.dc:creator: im late
item.content:encoded:
Pickup only
I will close around 24h after res bid

Fractal Design Define S Case
- Purchased from this build
- Note the modded front intake
- Case only, with the factory fans and the factory screw kit.
- Missing two back-plates ( a non issue if you are using a video card..)
- Custom V1 Tech PSU Cover included

Res - $50
